name: Sudoku Original
description: A classic puzzle game in which you need to make squares of numbers. The original version of the game with a lot of Sudoku of varying degrees of complexity.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 200 MB available space
